document_data.name: Zwei
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zwei''' was the first [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] to be credited with the creation of new spells. The [[variator]] introduced the three successively more powerful ''[[extension]]'' spells in the years [[-2579 DR|1280]] to [[-2559 DR|1300 NY]] of [[Netheril]]'s [[Netheril#The Silver Age|Silver Age]].<ref>

All other facts about Zwei's life (including his or her gender) were lost to history.<ref group="note">[[Arcane Age]] sources contain only information about Zwei related to the spells bearing his or her name.
document_data.Trivia: The [[Zweihausen]] were a pair of enormous houses on Netherese territory that were destroyed during the rise of human civilization.<ref> It is not known if Zwei was related to the Zweihausen or the namesake [[Zweihaus River]].<ref group="note">"Zwei" is [[Wikipedia:German language|German]] for "two", as in "Zweihausen" for "two houses".
